author: Special Correspondent
text: Supporting the dictum “Art for life’s sake”, Prof S Subbiah, Vice Chancellor, Alagappa University has said a poem should have a message and hailed the modern poetry, which has recorded social injustice powerfully in a simple language. Addressing the “National conference on World poetry: Ancient and Modern” organised in connection with World Poetry Day at the university here on Monday, he exhorted the students to pen poems as sometimes they might become popular and eternal.
title: Students urged to pen poems
